category.name: Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_QRY_search_result_display_mode
preference.preference_description: Specifies the search result display mode. Valid Values: * 1: The total number of found objects is not displayed. This is the default value. * 2: The total number of found objects only accounts for objects for which the user has access privileges.
